data.title: Ukraine - Largest cities 2022
data.meta_description: Kyiv was the largest city of Ukraine, with approximately 2.95 million inhabitants as of January 1, 2022.
data.text:
Largest cities in Ukraine 2022

Supplementary notes

Values have been rounded to provide a better understanding of the statistic.

According to the source, data relate to urban areas only.

The source specified the following information: "The Autonomous Republic of Crimea and Sevastopol were annexed by Russia in March 2014. This new status is not internationally recognized."

Release date is the date of access.
